duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute comprehensive people and organizational strategies to align with business objectives.
Lead a team of HR specialists, fostering collaboration and guiding their efforts towards achieving organizational goals.
Analyze organizational trends and employee behavior to identify opportunities for organizational development and refine strategies.
Manage employee relations and provide expertise in career planning, performance management, compensation, and rewards.
Utilize data-driven insights to measure and report on the performance of people programs, continuously improving organizational strategies.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Human Resources, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
